properties.name: action-icon-name
properties.description:
The Lightning Design System name of the action icon.
Specify the name in the format 'utility:down' where 'utility' is the category, and 'down' is the specific icon to be displayed.

properties.name: list-button-show-more-label
properties.description: Label of the button that appears in the list layout, when the number of avatars exceeds the max-count number.

properties.name: list-button-show-less-label
properties.description: Label of the button that appears in the list layout, when the number of avatars exceeds the max-count number.

properties.name: list-button-show-more-icon-name
properties.description: The Lightning Design System name of the list button icon. Specify the name in the format 'utility:down' where 'utility' is the category, and 'down' is the specific icon to be displayed.

properties.name: list-button-show-less-icon-name
properties.description: The Lightning Design System name of the list button icon. Specify the name in the format 'utility:down' where 'utility' is the category, and 'down' is the specific icon to be displayed.

properties.name: items
properties.description: An array of items to be rendered as avatar in a group.

properties.name: max-count
properties.description: The maximum number of avatars allowed in the visible list.
properties.default: 5 for stack, 11 for grid and list

properties.name: size
properties.description: The size of the avatars. Valid values include x-small, small, medium, large, x-large and xx-large.

properties.name: layout
properties.description: Defines the layout of the avatar group. Valid values include stack, grid and list.

properties.name: list-button-variant
properties.description: Variant of the button that appears in the list layout, when the number of avatars exceeds the max-count number.

properties.name: list-button-show-more-icon-position
properties.description: Position of the list button’s icon. Valid values include left and right.

properties.name: list-button-show-less-icon-position
properties.description: Position of the list button’s icon. Valid values include left and right.

properties.name: variant
properties.description: Shape of the avatars. Valid values include empty, circle or square.

properties.name: currentlistButtonLabel
properties.description: Current label of the list button (show more or show less)

properties.name: currentListButtonIcon
properties.description: Current icon name of the list button (show more or show less)

properties.name: currentListButtonPosition
properties.description: Current icon position of the list button (show more or show less)

properties.name: primaryItem
properties.description: If there are exactly two items, contains the first. Else contains an empty object.

properties.name: secondaryItem
properties.description: If there are exactly two items, contains the second. Else contains an empty object.

properties.name: listItems
properties.description: Computed list items

properties.name: listHiddenItems
properties.description: Hidden extra items

properties.name: avatarGroupClass
properties.description: Class wrapping the two-avatar group

properties.name: avatarInlineClass
properties.description: Class of avatars when displayed in a line

properties.name: avatarInlinePlusClass
properties.description: Class of the show more button when the avatars are displayed in a line

properties.name: avatarWrapperClass
properties.description: Class of the avatar wrapper, when there are more than two avatars

properties.name: actionButtonClass
properties.description: Class of the action button

properties.name: actionButtonWrapperClass
properties.description: Class of action button wrapper

properties.name: hiddenListClass
properties.description: Class of the hidden extra items dropdown

properties.name: actionButtonIconSize
properties.description: Action button icon size

properties.name: isClassic
properties.description: True if there are only two avatars visible

properties.name: isNotList
properties.description: True if the layout is not "list"

functions.name: handleAvatarClick
functions.description:
If the "show more" avatar was clicked, open the popover.
If another avatar was clicked, dispatch the avatarclick event.

events.name:
avatarclick
The event fired when the user click on an avatar.

actionclick
The event fired when the user clicks on an action.

properties.name: alternativeText
properties.description: The alternative text used to describe the avatar.

properties.name: initials
properties.description: If the record name contains two words, like first and last name, use the first capitalized letter of each. For records that only have a single word name, use the first two letters of that word using one capital and one lower case letter.

properties.name: fallbackIconName
properties.description:
The Lightning Design System name of the icon used as a fallback when the image fails to load. The initials fallback relies on this for its background color.
Names are written in the format 'standard:account' where 'standard' is the category, and 'account' is the specific icon to be displayed. Only icons from the standard and custom categories are allowed.

properties.name: src
properties.description: Image URL for the avatar of the group. If present, the avatar is displayed before the label.

properties.name: entityIconName
properties.description: Image URL for the avatar of the group. If present, the avatar is displayed before the label.

properties.name: entitySrc
properties.description: Image URL for the entity icon.

properties.name: entityPosition
properties.description: Position of the entity icon.

properties.name: entityVariant
properties.description: The variant changes the shape of the avatar. Valid values are empty, circle, and square. The value defaults to square.

properties.name: status
properties.description: An avatar’s status shows contextual information, such as if someone approves or declines something. Valid values include approved, locked, declined and unknown.

properties.name: statusTitle
properties.description: Title of the status icon.

properties.name: statusPosition
properties.description: Position of the status icon.

properties.name: presence
properties.description: A presence shows an avatar’s availability. Valid values include online, busy, focus, offline, blocked and away.

properties.name: presenceTitle
properties.description: Title of the presence icon.

properties.name: presencePosition
properties.description: Position of the presence icon.

properties.name: primaryText
properties.description: Primary text displayed next to the avatar.

properties.name: secondaryText
properties.description: Secondary text displayed next to the avatar.

properties.name: tertiaryText
properties.description: Tertiary text displayed next to the avatar.

properties.name: tags
properties.description:
Fields:

  • label: string.
  • variant: string. Valid values include default, inverse, lightest, success, warning, error. Default to default.
